sentence.Network_en: We are becoming one of the market leaders in the fashion industry.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们正在成为时装业的领军者之一。

sentence.Network_en: Recession has simply accelerated changes that have been reshaping the industry anyway.
sentence.Network_cn: 经济萧条只不过加速了原本就在改变行业状况的变化。

sentence.Network_en: Representatives from across the horse industry will attend the meeting.
sentence.Network_cn: 整个赛马业的代表都将参加这次会议。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in sense 2): from French industrie or Latin industria 'diligence'

entry.def: Industry is the work and processes involved in collecting raw materials, and making them into products in factories.

example.ex: British industry suffers through insufficient investment in research.
example.tran: 研究投入不足让英国工业深受其害。

example.ex: ...in countries where industry is developing rapidly.
example.tran: 在工业迅速发展的国家

entry.def: A particular industry consists of all the people and activities involved in making a particular product or providing a particular service.
If you refer to a social or political activity as an industry, you are criticizing it because you think it involves a lot of people in unnecessary or useless work.

example.ex: Some Afro-Caribbeans are rejecting the whole race relations industry...
example.tran: 一些加勒比黑人在抵制整个种族关系运动。

example.ex: The multibillion-dollar fitness industry rakes in fat profits from our hunger to look good.
example.tran: 数十亿美元的健身产业利用我们的爱美之心赚取巨额利润。

entry.def: Industry is the fact of working very hard.

example.ex: No one doubted his ability, his industry or his integrity.
example.tran: 没人怀疑他的能力、勤奋和正直。

means.word_mean: 1. the people or companies engaged in a particular kind of commercial enterprise;

sentences.sentence: "each industry has its own trade publications"

means.word_mean: 2. the organized action of making of goods and services for sale;

sentences.sentence: "American industry is making increased use of computers to control production"

means.word_mean: 3. persevering determination to perform a task;

sentences.sentence: "frugality and industry are still regarded as virtues"

auth_sentence.content: In an infant industry, that counts for something.

auth_sentence.res_content: Thousands of jobs in the industry have been lost.

auth_sentence.content: The dairy industry is really punishing on its animals.
auth_sentence.res_content: The dairy industry is really punishing on its animals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The dairy industry is really punishing on its animals.

stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉,变坏+struct建立,结构→adj.破坏的 n.故意或有计划的破坏 v.破坏

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可破坏的, 易毁坏的
stems_affixes.word_buile: destruct破坏+ible能……的→adj.可破坏的, 易毁坏的
destruct破坏+ive……的→adj.破坏性
industry工业, 产业+ial……的→industrial
industry勤奋+ious..的→industrious
instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+ive表形容词→adj.有益的, 教育性的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 仪器的;器械的;乐器的;起作用的;有帮助的
stems_affixes.word_buile: instrument[n.工具,仪器,器械;乐器]+al……的→adj.仪器的;器械的;乐器的;起作用的;有帮助的
obstruct[v.阻隔,阻塞[道路,通道等]n.阻碍物,障碍物]+ion表名词→n.妨碍,障碍物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 建造,构造;建筑物,结构;释义,解释
stems_affixes.word_buile: construct[v.建设,建造,构造;创立]+ion表名词→n.建造,构造;建筑物,结构;释义,解释
de去掉,变坏+struct建立,结构→adj.破坏的 n.故意或有计划的破坏 v.破坏
destruct破坏+ion表名词→弄坏结构→破坏

stems_affixes.value_cn: 工业, 产业, 行业, 勤奋
stems_affixes.word_buile: indu=in+str=struct建立,结构+y→n.工业, 产业, 行业, 勤奋
instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+ion表名词→n.教授;指导;[n.]用法说明[书],操作指南
instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+or人→n.指导者,教员
in内+stru=struct建立,结构+ment物→内部构造→仪器,工具
instrumental[adj.仪器的;器械的;乐器的;起作用的;有帮助的]+ity性质→n.手段
ob反+struct建立,结构→反建设→阻塞,阻碍
struct建立,结构+ure表名词→n.结构,构造;建筑物 v.构造,建造

stems_affixes.value_cn: 基础,下部结构,地下建筑
stems_affixes.word_buile: sub下面+struct建立,结构+ion表名词→建造在下面
super上面+structure结构→上面的结构→上层建筑
con共同+struct建立,结构→共同建立→建设,建造
de坏+stroy=struct建立,结构→v.破坏,摧毁,消灭
de去掉,变坏+struct建立,结构→adj.破坏的 n.故意或有计划的破坏 v.破坏
in进+struct建立,结构→把知识建立进去→指导,指示
ob反+struct建立,结构→反建设→阻塞,阻碍
re再+construct[v.建设,建造,构造;创立]→v.重建,再建;重现,再现
struct建立,结构+ure表名词→n.结构,构造;建筑物 v.构造,建造

Sentence.sentence: Contrary to many people's prediction of its death, the film industry survived.
It initiated the digital revolution in the film industry.
This year, without a terrorist attack, the hotel industry is "putting the same numbers on the board", says Mr Sorenson
She worked her way to success in the entertainment industry.
She was an icon of the entertainment industry
Its inability to curb the carbon emissions from industries.

sentences.en: The country's industry is assuming a new aspect.
sentences.cn: 该国的工业正在呈现新的面貌。

sentences.en: Does industry agree with the government?
sentences.cn: 工业界的意见与政府的一致吗?

sentences.en: The sea fisheries are an important industry in Norway.
sentences.cn: 海洋捕鱼业是挪威一项重要的产业。

sentences.en: The industry of these little ants is wonderful to behold.
sentences.cn: 这些小蚂蚁辛勤劳动的样子看上去真令人惊叹。

jushi.english: The clerk was rewarded for his industry.
jushi.chinese: 这位职员因工作勤勉而得到了奖赏。

jushi.english: His success was due to his industry and thrift.
jushi.chinese: 他的成功在于他的勤奋与俭朴。

jushi.english: China's industry is assuming a new aspect.
jushi.chinese: 中国的工业正在呈现新的面貌。
